narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Casleo LLC is a Home Delivered Meals provider based in Columbus, OH. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $117.5M in Medicaid payments across 2.9M claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $117.5M in taxpayer-funded Medicaid payments — enough to fund healthcare for approximately 14,691 Medicaid beneficiaries for a full year at average per-enrollee costs.
